text:
Because it is important/relevant to the CrankShaft community. A group of us are working toward saving Developer Day 2019. HubSpot has stated it might not happen due to budget reasons. Community members are helping to make it happen see <#CCGU4R4ER|extend> for the discussion and our ongoing doc if you are interested in volunteering, sponsoring, or helping coordinate in any capacity.
<https://docs.google.com/document/d/1PAB5YF25BA4nsPEnu01TCWxMCRpBWEJSHtqA12JTtf4/edit#>
